resources.string: Where\'s the password used for (program, website, etc.)?

For now these are the only values you can set.\nI will add some more configurable items to the password in the future. For now I think it\'s okay, because I want the app to become ready.\nIf you have any idea for additional values YOU want to configure for an password, please tell me so I can add them soon.

Click Next to setup Your main password.
This password should be easy to remember but also be strong enough so no one can break it.

This app offers You simple, easy and most of all a secure way to store your passwords.\nAlways with You and no drawbacks!

Your main password is used to log into this app. This password should be easily to remember but also hard to guess.\nRecommend is to use at least a length of 8. Also use upper and lower case letters, numbers and some special characters!
Now You entered your main password and Your personal magic number so let\'s perform a login and continue with the app!
